name: Player H. Squeezelite
description:
Squeezelite parameters ([**INFO**](https://www.max2play.com/en/wiki/command-line-options-for-squeezelite/) [**INFO2**](https://soundcheck-audio.blogspot.com/2017/10/raspberry-pi-audio-engine-part-2.html)) 
 **Timeout:** Close output device when idle after timeout seconds - Recommended value **1** 
 **DSD:** leave blank if the dac does not support DSD, -D for the dop option, -D :* for the various Native DSD options, type **alsacap** into the terminal to find out what type of dsd it supports audio output 
 **Min Sample rate:** Minimum sample rate supported the device 
 **Max Sample rate:** Maximum sample rate supported the device 
 **Buffer Time (ALSA):** buffer time in ms or size in bytes - default value **40** - value 1-499 
 **Period Count (ALSA):**  period count or size in bytes - value 1-49 - default **4** - recommended **3** 
 **Sample format (ALSA):** leave blank if you do not know 
 **Use mmap (ALSA):** 1 enable - 0 disable 
 **Internal Buffer stream:** Specify internal stream buffer sizes in kilobytes - default **2080** 
 **Internal Buffer stream:** Specify Output stream buffer sizes in kilobytes - default **3528** 
 **Enable log**: Leave empty not to enable the log 
 **Mac Adresse:** change this value if you have more squeezelite on the net, otherwise leave the default value 
 **Resampling:** ([**MORE INFO**](http://www.gentooplayer.com/squeezelite_resample)) 
 . 
 .

parameters.name: Timeout
parameters.description: Close output device when idle after timeout seconds

parameters.name: Audiocard
parameters.description: Select AudioCard

parameters.name: DSD
parameters.description: Select DSD Audio: | -D=dop | -D :* native dsd

parameters.name: Min Sample rate
parameters.description: Select Min SR dac supported

parameters.name: Max Sample rate
parameters.description: Select Max SR dac supported

parameters.name: Alsa parameters
parameters.description: Enable or Disable ALSA parameters. Disable use default parameters

parameters.name: Buffer Time (ALSA)
parameters.description: Specify ALSA params to open output device, buffer time in ms or size in bytes

parameters.name: Period Count (ALSA)
parameters.description: Specify ALSA params to open output device, period count or size in bytes

parameters.name: Sample format (ALSA)
parameters.description: Specify ALSA params to open output device, sample format

parameters.name: Use mmap (ALSA)
parameters.description: Specify ALSA params to open output device, use mmap

parameters.name: Internal Buffer stream
parameters.description: Specify internal Buffer stream - sizes in kilobytes

parameters.name: Output Buffer stream
parameters.description: Specify Output Buffer stream - sizes in kilobytes

parameters.name: Enable log
parameters.description: Enable Squeezelite-R2 log

parameters.name: Mac Adresse
parameters.description: Change the mac adresse

parameters.name: Resampling
parameters.description: Enable or Disable Resampling.

parameters.name: Quality
parameters.description: are  mutually  exclusive  and  correspond  to very high, high, medium, low or quick quality

parameters.name: Phase
parameters.description: correspond to linear, intermediate or minimum phase

parameters.name: Resampling bandwidth
parameters.description: changes resampling bandwidth from the default 95% (based on the 3dB point) to 99%, default empty.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: empty default (max syncro). E exception - avoids resampling if the output device supports the playback sample rate natively. X resamples to the maximum sample rate

parameters.name: Flags
parameters.description: empty default.

parameters.name: Attenuation
parameters.description: empty default: -1db - 0 will  disable  the  default

parameters.name: Precision
parameters.description: empty default. number of bits precision (NB. HQ = 20. VHQ = 28)

parameters.name: Passband_end
parameters.description: A percentage value between 0 and 100, The  default  if not explicitly set is 91.3

parameters.name: Passband_start
parameters.description: A percentage value between 0 and 100, The  default  if not explicitly set is 100

parameters.name: Phase_response
parameters.description: phase_response = 0-100 (0 = minimum / 50 = linear / 100 = maximum)
